meanings.sent1: The old house was cupolaed, with a small dome on top.
meanings.sent2: The church was cupolaed, featuring a beautiful tower with a rounded roof.
meanings.sent3: The cupolaed barn looked like a tiny castle from a fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: The cupolaed building stood out among the flat-roofed structures in the town.
meanings.sent5: The cupolaed structure added a touch of elegance to the skyline.

meanings.definition: Furnished with a cupola or cupolas.
meanings.sent1: The mansion was cupolaed, boasting multiple decorative domes.
meanings.sent2: The museum was cupolaed, showcasing intricate rooftop designs.
meanings.sent3: The cupolaed gazebo in the park provided a charming spot for picnics.
meanings.sent4: The cupolaed clock tower chimed melodiously every hour.
meanings.sent5: The cupolaed observatory offered a stunning view of the night sky.
